metadata.name: Close the eyes
metadata.description:
Listen to your heart's voice in silence, all the answers are there.
The heart is the beginning of the road.
It is from within the heart that the mind and energy can be changed from selfish to selfless.
When you feel forgiveness, kindness, trust, gratitude and love within your heart, that is when you are filled with a sense of completeness and wholeness, and you go from nothing to everything and from everything to nothing.
